title: Book 3: Charly Dances 'til It Drops
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 1,433 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 650L, Fiction Series
description: Charly is back in the third installment of a five-part series. Charly's town is in the middle of a drought, and no rain means no water for the wild oats, watermelons, and apples that Charly planted in the public park! But Charly is determined to make her New Year's "revolution" come true and to bring a smile to everyone's face with her garden. What will she do to make it rain?
highFrequencyWords: chemical, exotic, experiment, glistened, jealous, nonessential, permission, public, rain dance, resolution, spoil, unfortunately
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.

awareness: Order Words                : Identify and use order words
